name: First Sunday Bird Walk
description:
First Sunday Outing — Sowl Kere (Saul Kere)Time: Meet at 6:45 AM | Walk begins at 7:00 AMMeeting Point: Google Map(Near Adarsh Gem and Ecospace back gate; Parking available.)   Walk details:• Duration: Till around 9:45 AM (lake gates close at 10 AM)• Terrain: Level, approximately 2 km around the lake• Suitable for all ages—you may leave whenever you wish.   What to wear:• Dull-coloured clothes• Hats/caps• Comfortable walking shoes (avoid slippers or thin-soled sandals—the path is unpaved)•⁠ ⁠Rainwear or warm clothing, depending on the weather forecast   What to bring:• Binoculars, bird books/apps• Camera• Notebook/sketchpad and pencil (optional)• Drinking water and snacks   Nearby facilities:Restaurants and washrooms are available at• The Bay, EcoSpace Food Court: https://maps.app.goo.gl/aycdV3gUcrkpRmt18?g_st=ipc (Paid parking)• The Marketplace, Adarsh Palm Retreat (approx. 500 m from the lake, paid valet parking available): Google Map   This walk is free and open to all.
We look forward to meeting you on Sunday.
BlrBirders

name: Second Sunday Walk
description:
(Requires prior registration | Limited to 25 participants)   Registrations open at 8 pm on the second Thursday of the month    Time:Meet at 6:45 AMWalk begins at 7:00 AM   Meeting Point:Maramma Devi Temple
https://maps.app.goo.gl/mc8o6xhHc4K57WLF8?g_st=aw

name: Third Sunday Bird Walk
description:
WhereHesaraghatta Grasslands, we meet at the Animal Quarantine And Certification Services Hessarghatta Office and proceed from there towards ‘Rassba Farm’, where we will park our vehicles and use their facilities. We cross over to the grasslands from there to start the walk.   Nearest Bus Stop: CFSP Farm Stop, 2.6 Km/30 mins walk to the animal quarantine center office. Buses plying from Yelahanka towards Byatha stop here.    MapWe meet at https://maps.app.goo.gl/hS7DyGVL2FMJcnGh7 (please follow Google Maps to this place, to avoid muddy roads as much as possible) and proceed towards https://maps.app.goo.gl/5oUqJRzyANaJ735J7.   Wear: Dull-coloured clothes, hats/caps, comfortable walking shoes, rain gear if there is rain forecast.   Bring: Notebook and a pen/pencil, and water.   Optional: Bird books/apps, binoculars, cameras, and any snacks you may need.
   Post outing, one can opt for breakfast at Rassba Farms by ordering on the spot.   We look forward to meeting you on Sunday.   BlrBirders

location.name: Rassba Farm, Animal Quarantine and Certification Services

name: Fourth Sunday Bird Walk
description:
Where: Valley School
Meeting time: 7 am (walk ends by 9:30 am)   Registrations open at 8 pm on the Third Sunday of every month.   Registration is needed to participate in this walk, registrations open on the 3rd Sunday Night at 8 pm on this site and runs out very soon. Maximum 30 registrations allowed. Please click below to register. Registrations are CLOSED for February    Meeting point: https://maps.google.com/?cid=1444929533645339597&entry=gps   Nearest Public Transport: Catch going towards Kanakapura and get down at the Valley School Cross Bus Stop. Walk about 2 kms to reach the place. The nearest Metro is Silk Institute. Catch an auto to Valley School.   Wear: Dull-coloured clothes, hats/caps, comfortable walking shoes, rain gear if there is rain forecast.   Bring: Notebook, pen/pencil and water.   Optional: Bird books/apps, binoculars, cameras, and snacks that you may need.   Post-outing breakfast restaurant (Road-side parking available):Rajatagiri Palace: https://maps.app.goo.gl/onMmdCgWzKfz9n9C8   We look forward to meeting you on Sunday!   BlrBirders

name: Fifth Sunday Bird Walk
description:
Where: Jakkur Lake
Meeting time: 7 am (walk ends by 9:30 am)   Meeting point: https://maps.google.com/?cid=1444929533645339597&entry=gps (Main Gate)   Nearest Public Transport: Catch the Airport bus, KIA-9, from ‘Majestic’ to ‘Kogilu Cross’. Take an auto from there for the last 3 km to the lake, or take 283B to Raitarasanthe Yelahanka and choose to walk/catch an auto from there for the last 2
km.   Wear: Dull-coloured clothes, hats/caps, comfortable walking shoes, rain gear if there is rain forecast.   Bring: Notebook, pen/pencil and water.   Optional: Bird books/apps, binoculars, cameras, and snacks that you may need.   Post-outing breakfast restaurant (with parking available):New Krishna Sagar Food Court location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/onMmdCgWzKfz9n9C8   We look forward to meeting you on Sunday!   BlrBirders
